summary: THE TRACTION OFF LIGHT  TURNS ON AND OFF RANDOMLY.  WHEN IT RAINS THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT COMES ON THEN SHUTS OFF.  THE RADIO DISPLAY ONLY DISPLAYS PART OF THE NUMBERS SOMETIMES.  THE TURN SIGNAL WON'T WORK ALL THE TIME, I HAVE TO TURN ON THE HAZARDS AND IT WILL SOMETIMES KICK THE TURN SIGNAL ON.*AK
